How can I show that I've responded to the feedback in a comment?

As well as providing feedback, comments can also act as a todo list for people responding to feedback.

Only admins and editors are able to mark comments as complete.

Marking a comment as complete lets everyone know that the feedback as been actioned.

To mark a comment as complete, simply click the empty checkbox icon in the top right of the comment. This will check off the comment and grey it out.

To uncheck a comment simply click the checked checkbox icon.
